廸字的基本解释

廸
dí
同“迪”。

廸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dí］
［《廣韻》徒歷切，入錫，定。］
亦作“廸1”。
(1)道；道理。
(2)开导；引导。
(3)作；动。
(4)行，出走。
(5)蹈行，实行。
(6)进用，任用。
(7)顺从。
(8)继承；承袭。
(9)助词。用于句首或句中。
(10)姓。明有迪漆。见明顾起元《客座赘语·僻姓》。

廸字的康熙字典解释
廸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
廸字的起名意思

同“迪”。

Di
Basic explanation of words
Di
dí
Same as "Di".
Di
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dí］
["Guangyun" cut through the calendar, enter the tin, and set. ]
Also known as "Di 1".
(1) Tao; reason.
(2) Enlighten; guide.
(3) Work; move.
(4) Go, leave.
(5) Act along and practice.
(6) Admission and appointment.
(7) Obedience.
(8) Inheritance; inheritance.
(9) Particles. Used at the beginning or in a sentence.
(10) Last name. Obviously Di paint. See Ming Gu Qiyuan's "Gu Qiyuan".
